Welcome to mydocs's documentation!
==================================

Welcome to this comprehensive guide for setting up and maintaining your data science development environment! Here, you'll find a curated collection of practical setups and best practices tailored specifically for typical data science applications and frameworks. This documentation is crafted in a cookbook style, focusing on frequently used tasks, handy cheat sheets, and step-by-step instructions for common setups.

In the fast-paced world of data science, it's easy to forget the nuances of setting up environments, installing software, and configuring frameworks. That's where this documentation comes in. Whether you're provisioning workstations, servers, or deploying frameworks, you'll find the guidance you need, when you need it.

From installing Anaconda to optimizing Linux systems, from configuring essential libraries to deploying Sphinx for Read the Docs, the essentials you'll encounter time and again in your data science journey are covered here. Think of this as your go-to resource for those tasks you don't do every day but need a reliable reference for when you do.

So, whether you're setting up your environment for the first time or refreshing your memory on a particular setup, dive into this documentation and unlock the efficiencies and best practices that will streamline your data science workflows. Let's make your journey in data science as smooth and productive as possible. Happy cooking!
